name: Sharp Stone
description: Strike two rocks together to make a sharp edge.

name: Log (Pine)
description: Chop a pine tree with a sharp stone.

name: Log (Oak)
description: Chop an oak tree with a sharp stone.

name: Log (Birch)
description: Chop a birch tree with a sharp stone.

name: Log from Dead Tree
description: Chop a dead tree for wood.

name: Kindling
description: Cut a log into kindling with a sharp stone.

name: Spear
description: Attach a sharp stone to a wooden shaft to create a spear.

name: Kindling from Spear
description: Break down a spear shaft into kindling.

name: Basket
description: Weave two bundles of kindling into a basket.

name: Basket from Reeds
description: Weave reeds into a sturdy basket.

name: Fire
description: Strike a rock against kindling to start a fire.

name: Kitchen
description: Build a kitchen using rocks around a fire.

name: Cook Meat (Fire)
description: Roast raw meat over an open flame.

name: Cook Meat (Kitchen)
description: Prepare a meal in the kitchen.

name: Cook Fish (Fire)
description: Cook fresh fish over a fire.

name: Cook Fish (Kitchen)
description: Prepare fish in the kitchen.

name: Bow
description: String a wooden shaft with fur to make a bow.

name: Arrow
description: Whittle kindling into a sharp arrow.

name: Boat
description: Carve a log into a simple boat using a shovel.

name: Slaughter Rabbit (Arrow)
description: Kill a rabbit directly with an arrow.

name: Slaughter Rabbit (Spear)
description: Kill a rabbit directly with a spear.

name: Slaughter Deer (Arrow)
description: Kill a deer directly with an arrow.

name: Slaughter Deer (Spear)
description: Kill a deer directly with a spear.

name: Slaughter Wolf (Arrow)
description: Kill a wolf directly with an arrow.

name: Slaughter Wolf (Spear)
description: Kill a wolf directly with a spear.

name: Slaughter Boar (Arrow)
description: Kill a boar directly with an arrow.

name: Slaughter Boar (Spear)
description: Kill a boar directly with a spear.

name: Catch Fish (Spear)
description: Spear a fish in the water.

name: Butcher Rabbit
description: Butcher a rabbit for meat.

name: Skin Rabbit
description: Skin a rabbit for its fur.

name: Butcher Deer
description: Butcher a deer for meat.

name: Skin Deer
description: Skin a deer for its fur.

name: Butcher Wolf
description: Butcher a wolf for meat.

name: Skin Wolf
description: Skin a wolf for its fur.

name: Butcher Boar
description: Butcher a boar for meat.

name: Skin Boar
description: Skin a boar for its fur.

name: Harvest Bones
description: Extract bones from a decayed carcass.

name: Shovel
description: Lash a flat stone to a log to make a shovel.

name: Dig Hole
description: Dig a hole in the ground.

name: Grave
description: Lay the bones to rest in the hole.

name: Grave Stone
description: Place a memorial stone on the grave.

name: Wheat Seeds
description: Harvest wild wheat for seeds.

name: Plant Wheat
description: Plant wheat seeds in the soil.

name: Harvest Wheat
description: Harvest mature wheat for more seeds.

name: Flour
description: Grind wheat into flour using a rock.

name: Bread (Fire)
description: Bake flour into bread over a fire.

name: Bread (Kitchen)
description: Bake bread in the kitchen.

name: Carrot Seeds
description: Harvest wild carrot for seeds.

name: Plant Carrot
description: Plant carrot seeds in the soil.

name: Collect Berries
description: Pick berries from the bush.

name: Plant Berry Bush
description: Plant berries to grow a new berry bush.

name: Collect Mushroom
description: Pick a wild mushroom.

name: Collect Wild Carrot
description: Pick a wild carrot.

name: Collect Reeds
description: Cut reeds from the swamp.

name: Cook Mushroom (Fire)
description: Cook mushrooms over a fire.

name: Cook Mushroom (Kitchen)
description: Cook mushrooms in the kitchen.
